arts.ttl: Real Deal Pods: Real Madrid & La Liga Data Review
arts.sum: On this Members-only episode of the Managing Madrid Podcast, Siddharth Ramsundar and Ali Elfakharany of Statsbomb discuss the state of the top of La Liga & Real Madrid : A lot of mismatch between expectations and reality at Real Madrid considering the team wasn’t as great as results suggested last season?

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe injury latest: Will Real Madrid star play in FIFA Intercontinental Cup final?
arts.sum: Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti provides a positive update on the fitness of Kylian Mbappe ahead of Wednesday's FIFA Intercontinental Cup final against Pachuca in Qatar.

arts.sum: The votes cast by Barcelona legend Lionel Messi for this year’s ‘The Best’ award have on Tuesday been revealed. FIFA’s The Best ceremony, of course, took place earlier this evening.…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid possible lineup against Pachuca in the Intercontinental Cup final
arts.sum: Real Madrid face their first final of the season : as such, the starting eleven will feature the best at Ancelotti’s disposal, boosted by the return of key players from injury: Camavinga and Mbappé . The game will be played on Wednesday December 18 at Lusail Stadium with kick off at 12:00 p.m. ET / 9:00 a.m. PT.

arts.ttl: Barcelona & Real Madrid stars named in FIFA’s ‘The Best’ XI of the Year
arts.sum: Leading members of the first-team squads at Spanish football’s two leading clubs were on Tuesday named in FIFA’s prestigious ‘The Best’ XI. The Best ceremony, of course, took place earlier…

arts.ttl: Spot-on Chelsea win group after Macario’s double sees off Real Madrid
arts.athr: Sid Lowe at the Estadio Alfredo di Stéfano
arts.sum: A 10-minute storm brought by Catarina Macario was enough to see Chelsea through. They had trailed and they had been taken to the line but ultimately two goals from the American and the misfortune of Real Madrid’s captain, Olga Carmona, maintained their perfect record. Introduced at half-time on a cold night in front of 2,057, Macario changed the game and smashed in a pair of penalties that put the WSL leaders into the quarter-finals as winners of Group B. “That was mentally very important for us,” Sonia Bompastor said. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Immediate Reaction: Real Madrid 1-2 Chelsea; UWCL 2024
arts.sum: In the second minute of the encounter, Weir shot on target from the entrance of the penalty area after a recovery by Angeldahl at the touchline on the right. From the start of the second half, Macario went on to attack.
